General.Name: Shanxi Meijin Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Meijin Energy Co., Ltd. produces and sells commercial coke, coking coal, and coking by-products in China. The company provides pig iron, coke, coke powder, dedusting ash, coke oven gas, coal tar, crude benzene/light benzene, ammonium sulfate, sulfur, urea, and LNG products; chemical products, metal materials, and steel products. It also offers energy-saving control products, mechanical and electrical products, and electrical products; and engages in the general road transportation of goods. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taiyuan, China.

4.Name: Mr. Qinghua  Zhu
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. & Non Independent Director
